Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.beans

This package contains various utility beans.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AnyRange<T extends Comparable<? super T>> AnyRange is a Range that contains all values.
Array Wrapper around an array of objects.
AssociationTable<L,R> Associates pairs of elements.
BdCalculator BdCalculator makes calculations keeping always the same count of decimal places on the results.
ConditionalMethod<T,P> ConditionalMethod pairs conditions that check an object of type T with methods of a class of P.
ConditionalStringBuilder Utility bean that for the creation of a string that is built dynamically based on dynamically evaluated conditions.
DynamicMethod<T,P> DynamicMethod pairs values with methods of a class of P.
ExpressionBasedSelection<V,S> ExpressionBasedSelection makes a selection by evaluating a series of expressions.
FolderInitializedBean This bean is a container of String fields that can be initialized by the files of a folder.
MessageGetter A message getter fetches messages from a resource bundle.
MessagesBean  
MultipleValuesMap<K,V>  
Null Null safe representation of null.
Pair<L,R> A pair of two objects, the left and right objects.
PairWithComparableLeft<L extends Comparable<? super L>,R> Creates a Pair whose left value is Comparable.
PropertiesInitializedBean Properties initialized bean is a javabean that is initialized by a Properties object.
Range<T extends Comparable<? super T>> Range represents a range between two comparable values.
SystemState  
Timer Timer utility.
Tree<T> Since java.util still does not have a Tree implementation, here is one.
TypeBasedSelection<T> This bean provides an easy solution to selecting a value that depends on an object being an instance of a type.
 

Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.beans Description

This package contains various utility beans.
The classes of this package are not specific to the Bo2 project, but can be used independently anywhere.
